name: Cities Of Wonder
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Made for Ludum Dare 46

Click the buttons as they light up to keep the city night life alive

The city lights are off and only you can keep them on and powered.

Press the highlighted buttons to keep the system going and the Giant Robot Hula Hooping.

The energy made by the Giant keeps the city alive. Otherwise darkness will descend on the City Of Wonder...

Post Ludum Dare Version

Has additional buttons, intro and ending animation.
